#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<string.h>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int revint(int x)
{
	int y=0;
	while(x!=0)
	{
	  y=y*10+(x%10);
	  x=x/10;
	}
	 return y;
}
main()
{
	int t;cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
      int n1,n2;
      cin>>n1>>n2;
      n1=revint(n1);
      n2=revint(n2);
      n1=n1+n2;
      cout<<revint(n1)<<endl;
	}
}
